title: JSON content used at build time to get Telugu sentences

content.meaning: This is a picture of me.

content.sentence: nā@ pēru buḍugu. iṃko pēru piḍugu. mā bāmma hāri piḍugā aṃṭuṃdi. aṃduku.
content.meaning: My name is Budugu. I have another name, Pidugu. My grandma calls me 'Hari Piduga.' That's why.

content.sentence: iṃko assalu pēruṃdi. ippuḍu ceppaḍāniki ṭaimu lēdu. adi cālā poḍugu. kāvālistē mā nānnani aḍugu.
content.meaning: I have yet another name. There is not enough time to say it right now. It is very long. If you want (to know) it, ask my dad.

content.sentence: ānāḍu bejavāḍalō akhilabhārata kāṃgres kamiṭī samāvēśaṃ jarigiṃdi. kāṃgres jīvitaṃlō ā samāvēśāniki eṃtō cāritraka prāmukhyaṃ vuṃdi.
content.meaning: On that day, there was a Congress Committee meeting. That meeting is very historically important in the life of Congress.

content.sentence: - kāṃgresnu vistṛta prātipadikagala prajāsaṃsthagā rūpoṃdiṃcēṭaṃduku ā samāvēśaṃlōnē nirṇayiṃcāru.
content.meaning: In that meeting alone, the Congress decided to become a public institution.

content.sentence: - khaddaru vudyamaṃ, madyaniṣēdhaṃ kāṃgresu kāryakramaṃlō bhāgālugā svīkariṃcabaḍḍāyi.
content.meaning: Wearing the khaddar and prohibition were adopted into its program.

content.sentence: - prajala nuṃcē prajōdyamāla nirvahaṇaku dhanaṃ sēkariṃcē nirṇayaṃ tīsukonnāru.
content.meaning: They decided to collect money to organize a public event.

content.sentence: ānāṭi nuṃcī muppēṭana jātīyōdyamaṃ telugudēśaṃ nālugu ceragulā alumukuṃdi.
content.meaning: Since that day, the natoinal movement has struck the Telugu country like four sticks.
